EmailTemplate.description: Used as a case escalation for the Chemical Service tickets
EmailTemplate.name: Chemical Services Unassigned Ticket Escalation
EmailTemplate.subject: Chemical Services Ticket #: {!Case.CaseNumber} was not reassigned within 30 minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Chemical Services Ticket #: {!Case.CaseNumber} was created and assigned to the {!Case.OwnerFullName} queue but was not reassigned to a queue member within 30 minutes:
Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Thank you,
Citron Hygiene
800.643.6922
